content.rendered:
February 5 to 7, 2025 | Bangalore

MLDS 2025

Edition
0 th
Attendees
0 +
Speakers
0 +
Organizations
0 +
Reserve a Spot
Partner with us

Code Craze Carnival

Get ready to dive into a whirlwind of exciting activities designed to ignite your creativity, challenge your skills, and amplify your fun. From electrifying on-stage battles to mind-bending off-stage quests, this is where AI meets amusement!

On-Stage Shenanigans

1. The Battle of The Bots

Category: Live Coding Showdown

Overview: Gear up for the ultimate face-off as teams race against time to build the most brilliant conversational agent using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). It’s code, compete, conquer!

Details:

  • Objective: Craft a savvy sales chatbot that dazzles with real-time responses.
  • Setup: Two teams, loaded laptops, and a dash of ingenuity.
  • Execution: 45 minutes to glory. Ready, set, code!
  • Judging Criteria: Wit, speed, and user charm.
  • Prizes: Tech gadgets and eternal bragging rights.

2. The Design Face-Off

Category: Creative Image Generation Duel

Overview: Unleash your imagination in this epic image generation challenge using NVIDIA’s AI Playground. Match the prompts, wow the crowd, and let your creativity run wild!

Details:

  • Setup: Teams armed with AI and a spark of genius.
  • Challenge: 10 rounds of prompt-based artistry.
  • Scoring: Accuracy, originality, and flair.
  • Prizes: The spotlight and some sweet swag.

3. Man vs. Machine: The Code-Off

Category: Interactive Coding Clash

Overview: Witness the thrilling duel between human coding prowess and AI-assisted problem-solving. Who will reign supreme?

Details:

  • Objective: Solve coding puzzles faster, be it brain or bot.
  • Execution: Five rounds of rapid-fire challenges.
  • Judging Criteria: Speed, smarts, and style.
  • Prizes: Cool gear and epic tales to tell.

Off-Stage Adventures

1. Optimization Olympics

Category: Code Tweaking Tournament

Overview: Sharpen your code and your wits in this challenge to supercharge a deep learning model. It’s all about that performance boost!

Details:

  • Objective: Turbocharge the training time and accuracy.
  • Setup: Pre-loaded code, a dataset, and your optimization mojo.
  • Judging Criteria: Efficiency, innovation, and clever hacks.
  • Prizes: Advanced courses and the optimizer’s crown.

2. Hack & Slash Arcade

Category: Spontaneous Coding Games

Overview: Step into our arcade of random challenges, from prompt-based games to rapid app building. Let the code games begin!

Details:

  • Activities: PromptPlay, code sprints, and AI-infused fun.
  • Objective: Innovate on the fly and impress the crowd.
  • Prizes: Surprises await the swift and the savvy.

3. Crack the Code: AI Edition

Category: Short, Sharp Hackathon

Overview: Dive into a world of encrypted images and hidden patterns. Use your AI skills to decode the undecodable!

Details:

  • Dataset: A cryptic collection of visual riddles.
  • Objective: Reveal the unseen using your AI toolkit.
  • Evaluation Metrics: Clarity, precision, and that “Aha!” moment.
  • Prizes: Recognition as the master decoder.

Pre-Event Extravaganzas

1. Ideathon Quest: GenAI Edition

Category: Online Innovation Hunt

Overview: Embark on a pre-event adventure to craft groundbreaking AI solutions for real-world industries. The best ideas hit the MLDS main stage!

Details:

  • Use Cases: Choose your battleground—Cybersecurity, Smart Healthcare Solutions, Supporting Mental and Behavioral Health or Governance Applications
  • Tech Arsenal: LLMs, Agentic AI, RAG systems—you pick!
  • Submission: Host on MachineHack, demo your genius.
  • Top 3: The crème de la crème showcase live at MLDS.
Participate

Elevate: The Ultimate LLM Challenge

Category: AI Hackathon Sprint

Overview:
Get ready to push the boundaries of what’s possible with large language models (LLMs) in this high-octane hackathon. The stage is set for innovation—show the world your brilliance!

Details:
  • Platform: MachineHack.com awaits your brilliance.
  • Objective: Fine-tune LLMs to master sequence classification like a pro.
  • Leaderboard: Climb it, own it.
  • Top 3: Earn the spotlight and present your masterpiece on the MLDS stage.
Participate

Open Learning Wonderland

1. Guru Grotto with Sachin Tripathi 
Join the sage of AI, Sachin Tripathi, in open mentoring sessions. Wisdom awaits those who seek!

2. DataDive Workshops by Datalyze 
Plunge into interactive sessions covering the spectrum of machine learning and data science. Knowledge is power!

3. Treasure Trove Trail 
Embark on a three-day treasure hunt packed with puzzles and quests. Who will claim the grand prize?

4. AI Karaoke Jam Session 
Sing your heart out with AI-generated tunes and lyrics. It’s music, but make it techy!

5. Avatar Forge Workshop 
Craft your digital doppelgänger using cutting-edge AI. It’s time to meet your virtual self!

Our Speakers

Check all speakers

Chirag Jain

Vice President, AI Practice at Genpact

Abhishek Ashok

Chief Technology Officer at SmartQ

Sakthivel B

Director, Data Science at Tiger Analytics

Shakuntala Gupta

Technology Consulting – AI & Data, EY Global Delivery Services India

Sourav Banerjee

Head of R&D and Platform at MathCo

Paras Chopra

Turing's Dream

Rahul Bhattacharya

GDS Consulting AI Leader at EY

Lavi Nigam

Developer Relations Engineer at Google Cloud


Grab your ticket for a unique experience of inspiration, meeting and networking for the AI industry

Book your tickets at the earliest. We have a hard stop at 1000 passes.

Note: Ticket Pricing to change at any time.

  • 1 Day Pass

  • Access to all in-person tracks & workshops
  • Access the recorded sessions later
  • Access to in-person networking with attendees & speakers
  • Conference Lunch for 1 Day
  • No Group Discount Available
  • ₹7000
Recommended

  • Full Access Passes

    All Access 3 Day Pass
  • Access to all in-person tracks & workshops
  • Access the recorded sessions later
  • Access to in-person networking with attendees & speakers
  • Conference Lunch for all 3 days
  • No Group Discount Available
  • ₹15000

40 under 40 data scientists awards

40Under40 is an attempt towards recognizing the leading data scientists in India who have successfully transformed data into meaningful insights.

More Details

The Biggest ai conference for developers in india

call for papers

MLDS will include additional programs for technical paper presentations.

More Details

It’s been a bit late to post this but I have to say what an event it really was (Machine Learning Developers Summit’23), after COVID the first time this event happened without virtual meeting and the interaction was also amazing by Data Scientists & Machine learning engineers/ enthusiasts, thanks to AIM

Het Patel

IBM

Attended the brilliant and insightful #MLDS2023. The sessions, talks, presentations and workshops were engaging and knowledgeable, a very enriching experience.

Arijit Gayen

iMerit

Attending the Machine Learning Summit 2023 in Bangalore was an incredible opportunity for me to deepen my understanding of the latest advancements and trends in the field. The keynote speakers were inspiring and provided valuable insights, and I had the chance to network with many other professionals and experts in the industry. I am excited to apply what I have learned to my work and continue to stay ahead of the curve in the field of machine learning.

KIRTHIK A

KGiSL

Michelin is glad to be a part of the Machine Learning Developers Summit (MLDS) 2023 which concluded last week in Bangalore, India. The summit comprised of numerous keynote sessions by industry experts.

Michelin

»Developers are the ones who build the future.«


Garry Kasparov
AI Pioneer, Human Rights Activist
World Chess Champion
